item.title: M5 MacBook Pro No Longer Coming in 2025
item.description: Apple does not plan to refresh any Macs with updated M5 chips in 2025, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. Updated MacBook Air and MacBook Pro models are now planned for the first half of 2026. Gurm
